name: Vardhishnu Social Research and Development Society
briefDescription: Vardhishnu Social Research and Development Society is a not-for-profit organisation established with an aim to work on specific social issues through empirical research and implementation based on its finding. Vardhishnu started its activities with a 'socio-economic analysis of waste pickers working in Jalgaon' an research to understand life and struggle of waste pickers. The results emphasis need to work on three important aspects of human life: education, health and addiction. In 2014 we started 'Anandghar ( A Home of Happiness)  an community learning center.The idea is to provide basic formal & informal education and skills to child waste pickers as well as out-of-school children and make them capable of joining main stream schools to cope with the learning process in the school. Till date we have successfully enrolled and sustained more than 100 children into the main stream schools. Currently we are running 3 such centers catering to the need of 125+ children.
